  • Uses of PolynomialEstimator in com.irurueta.numerical.polynomials.estimators

    Subclasses of PolynomialEstimator in com.irurueta.numerical.polynomials.estimators
    Modifier and Type
    Class
    Description
    class 
    LMSEPolynomialEstimator
    This class defines an LMSE (Least Mean Square Error) estimator of a polynomial of a given degree using points where polynomials (or its derivatives or integrals) are evaluated.
    class 
    WeightedPolynomialEstimator
    This class implements a polynomial estimator using weighted evaluations.
